ygData.subject: Re: Reminder - eqbards irc chat
ygData.msgSnippet: One of my bands has a steady Wednesday gig - I like the idea of an IRC chat - please try to rotate the days of the week if you do another one. Slyde ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
One of my bands has a steady Wednesday gig - I like the idea of an IRC
chat - please try to rotate the days of the week if you do another one.

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <eqbards-owner@onelist.com>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 1999 6:32 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Reminder - eqbards irc chat


> From: eqbards-owner@onelist.com
>
> We would like to remind you of this upcoming event.
>
> eqbards irc chat
>
> Date: Wednesday, November 24, 1999
> Time: 08:00PM - 10:00PM EST (GMT-05:00)
>
> A moderated chat for the members of eqbards. If all goes well
> the chat will be open discussion.
> server: irc.stratics.com
> room: #eqbards
>
> Any questions or problems just email chat@...
>
